briefdescription.para: Join two NodeCollections.

memberdef.name: slice

briefdescription.para: Slices the NodeCollection to the boundaries, with an optional step parameter.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the boundaries being specified are inclusive.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the NodeCollection to start at
One past the index of the NodeCollection to stop at
Number of places between node IDs to skip. Defaults to 1

simplesect.para: a NodeCollection pointer to the new, sliced NodeCollection.

briefdescription.para: Sets the metadata of the NodeCollection.

parameterdescription.para: A Metadata pointer

briefdescription.para: Gets the metadata of the NodeCollection.
Checks if the NodeCollection has no elements.

simplesect.para: true if the NodeCollection is empty, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Returns index of node with given node ID in NodeCollection.

simplesect.para: Index of node with given node ID; -1 if node not in NodeCollection.

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the NodeCollection contains any nodes with proxies or not.

simplesect.para: true if any nodes in the NodeCollection has proxies, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Checks if node IDs in another primitive is a continuation of node IDs in this primitive.

parameterdescription.para: Primitive to check for continuity

simplesect.para: True if the first element in the other primitive is the next after the last element in this primitive, and they both have the same model ID. Otherwise false.

briefdescription.para: Checks if node IDs of another primitive is overlapping node IDs of this primitive.

parameterdescription.para: Primitive to be checked.

simplesect.para: True if the other primitive overlaps, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Subclass for the primitive NodeCollection type.

detaileddescription.para: The primitive type contains only homogeneous and contiguous node IDs. It also contains model ID and metadata of the node IDs.
